data.title: A Site Stealth Drone + Salvo Execute
data.description: Clear the right side of A Site and Tree with this Drone, and then follow up with a Guided Salvo to flush out Defenders playing the site.

data.title: C Site Drone + Salvo Execute
data.description: Successfully support your team with this combination of utility towards the C Site, making it difficult for Defenders to play on site.
